author: Jaid <jaid.jsx@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Jaid)

scripts.build-push: npm run build && git add build && git commit --sign --message 'Rebuilt src/' && git push
scripts.testOnGithub: name=$(npx package-name-cli) && npm run build-push && cd ../test && npm run randomCommit && release && cd ../$name
scripts.testOnGithubProd: name=$(npx package-name-cli) && npm run build-push && cd ../epoch-seconds && release && cd ../$name

description: GitHub Action that publishes compiled code to npm and similar package registries.
